name: CMIOExtensionDevice
desc: An object that represents a physical or virtual device.

items.name: init(localizedName: String, deviceID: UUID, source: CMIOExtensionDeviceSource)
init(localizedName: String, deviceID: UUID, legacyDeviceID: String?, source: CMIOExtensionDeviceSource)
items.desc: Creates an extension device with an optional legacy device identifier.

items.name: var localizedName: String
items.desc: A localized name for a device.

items.name: var deviceID: UUID
items.desc: A universally unique device identifier value.

items.name: var streams: [CMIOExtensionStream]
items.desc: An array of media streams attached to this device.

items.name: func addStream(CMIOExtensionStream)
items.desc: Adds a stream to a device.

items.name: func removeStream(CMIOExtensionStream)
items.desc: Removes a stream from the device.

items.name: var source: CMIOExtensionDeviceSource?
items.desc: A source object for a device.
